reasons: more meaningful lines and consistency;less repetition
output:
I still have a dream. It is a dream deeply rooted in the American dream. I have a dream that one day this nation will rise up and live out the true meaning of its dream. We hold these truths to be self-evident that all men are created equal.
I have a dream that one day on the Red Hills of Georgia, sons of former slaves and the sons of former slavers will be able to sit down and gather at the table of brotherhood. I have a dream that one day, even the state of Mississippi will be able to stand up and say, I have a dream.
I have a dream.
